page.title: 10THE ROYAL OAK MILLTHORPE
page.content: The Royal Oak Public House is situated between Cordwell Valley and Millthorpe.{One part}of the public house has been standing for{360 years and the{other part}for{150}years.The public house has a separate garden to the rear in which children can play. The Royal Oak Public House has{stone {walls}with{oak ceiling beams}and the {roof}is made of pure{slate.}The roof is very low with two rooms with a drinking bar in each.The landlord lives in an upstairs room.In the winter people mainly come from Dronfield,Holmesfield and Chesterfield but in the summer people come from all over.If the{emergency {services}are wanted the 999 call is answered in Shefffield who relay it to Chesterfield.A local fun run is provided each year for charity.
